name: Andrea Marrella
content: Andrea Marrella - Home Page Home Research Stays Awards Project Grants Keynote and Panel Speaker Invited Talks Tutorials Institutional Responsabilities Professional Service Contact Information Teaching Publications Research Interests Projects Personal Details WELCOME ON MY WEB PAGE I am an Associate Professor in Computer Science and Engineering at Dipartimento di Ingegneria Informatica, Automatica e Gestionale "A. Ruberti" , Sapienza - Università di Roma. In March 2025, I got the National Scientific Habilitation (Abilitazione Scientifica Nazionale) as Full Professor for sector 01/B1 (Informatica). In June 2023, I got the National Scientific Habilitation (Abilitazione Scientifica Nazionale) as Full Professor for sector 09/H1 (Sistemi di Elaborazione delle Informazioni). My short cv can be found here. RESEARCH STAYS From January to June 2012, I have been a visiting researcher at York University in Toronto (Canada), Department of Computer Science and Engineering. From June to August 2013, I have been a visiting researcher at Ryerson University (now Toronto Metropolitan University) in Toronto (Canada), Department of Computer Science. From October to November 2016, I have been a visiting researcher at University of Tartu in Estonia, Institute of Computer Science. AWARDS My former PhD Student Simone Agostinelli won the Best Dissertation Award at 21st International Conference on Business Process Management (BPM 2023), for his PhD thesis on Synthesizing Software Robots from UI Logs in Robotic Process Automation. Best Forum Paper Award at the 31th International Conference on Advanced Information Systems Engineering (CAiSE 2019), 3-7 June 2019, Rome, Italy, for the paper: Achieving GDPR Compliance of BPMN Process Models. Best Paper Award at the 29th International Conference on Advanced Information Systems Engineering (CAiSE 2017), 12-16 June 2017, Essen, Germany, for the paper: Multi-party Business Process Resilience By-Design: A Data-centric Perspective. PROJECT GRANTS (SELECTED) For a full and up-to-date list, see here. Co-Principal Investigator of the research project MOTOWN: "Smart Production Planning and Control for Manufacturing of Electric Vehicle Powertrain in Industry 4.0" (PRIN 2022), funded by Ministero dell'Università e della Ricerca in 2023. Unit Leader and Principal Investigator for Sapienza of the research project DataCloud: "Enabling the big data pipeline lifecycle on the computing continuum", funded by Horizon 2020 European Union Programme in 2021. Project Coordinator of the research project Cicero-Net: "La rete turistica dei luoghi di Cicerone", funded by Regione Lazio (DTC) in 2021. KEYNOTE AND PANEL SPEAKER Keynote Speaker at 3rd Int. Workshop on Process Management in the AI Era (PMAI 2024), 19 Oct. 2024, Santiago de Compostela, Spain. Balancing Autonomy and Trust to Enable Intelligent Robotic Process Automation. Panel Speaker at AI Forum 2023, 5 April 2023, Milan, Italy, on the topic of "AI Augmented Business Process Management". Keynote Speaker at Int. Workshop on BP Innovation with AI (BPAI'17), 11 Sept. 2018, Barcelona, Spain. What Automated Planning can do for Business Process Management. INVITED TALKS Invited talk on "Automated Planning in AI for BPMers" at ERCIS Winter School on Advanced BPM Topics, 23 January 2025, University of Seville, Seville, Spain. Invited talk on "Balancing Autonomy and Trust to Enable Intelligent Robotic Process Automation" at University of Oxford, 15 November 2024, Oxford, United Kingdom. Invited talk on "Foundations of Automated Planning in AI as-a-Service" at Twelfth European Big Data Management & Analytics Summer School (eBISS 2024), 5 July 2024, Università degli Studi di Padova, Padova, Italy. Invited talk on "Automated Planning-as-a-Service: Theory and Practice" at 18th Symposium and Summer School On Service-Oriented Computing (SummerSOC 2024), 28 June 2024, Crete, Greece. Invited talk on "Framed Autonomy in AI-Augmented Business Process Management: Vision, Opportunities and Challenges" in the context of Colloquia Seminars CNR/IASI, 13 June 2024, Consiglio Nazionale delle Ricerche (CNR), Rome, Italy. Invited talk on "The use of AI Planning for BPM" at University of Tartu (Estonia) in 2016. Invited talks on "Adaptive Process Management in Cyber-Physical Domains" at Vienna University of Economics and Business (Austria) and ULM University (Germany) in 2014. Invited talk on "Synthesis of Process Models through AI Planning" at Ryerson University (now Toronto Metropolitan University, Toronto, Canada) in 2013. Invited talks on "Adaptive Process Management through Situation Calculus, Indigolog and Automated Planning" at University of Toronto (Canada) and York University (Toronto, Canada) in 2012. TUTORIALS Speaker: Mastering Robotic Process Automation with Process Mining at 20th Int. Conf. on Business Process Management (BPM 2022), 14 Sept. 2022, Münster, Germany. Speaker: Applications of Automated Planning for Business Process Management at 19th Int. Conf. on Business Process Management (BPM 2021), 7 Sept. 2021, Rome, Italy. Speaker: IoT for BPMers. Challenges, Case Studies and Successful Applications at 17th Int. Conf. on Business Process Management (BPM 2019), 3 Sept. 2019, Vienna, Austria. Speaker: Process Mining: from Zero to Hero at 18th Int. Conf. on Product-Focused Software Process Improvement (PROFES 2017), 29 November 2018, Innsbruck, Austria.
